de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces

Interface IAskMe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPopupExtender

    public interface IAskMe
extends IPopupExtender
    Represents the panel with an editor. It's used mainly to highlight the buzzwords assigned to the project or subproject or as the panel for the question preview.
